Apple Store

I tried to recreate the Apple Store with the original design. I also implemented the ability to search for products. I mainly used React.js and Tailwindcss.

Architecture

This site is a complete redesign concept of the Helen & Hard homepage. The elegant design highlights the high-quality architecture.

FlexNet

For the design of this site, I was inspired by Netflix. Currently the site does not have any special functionality, but as soon as I find an interesting API I will implement it.

Mercedes

This is a redesign concept of a page dedicated to the model of a vehicle. For this site I used a css preprocessor (Scss).
